column1: # Configures how the flagfile will look like.
# Headers of colums to be used
# Where corresponding results are found (yaml-files typically created by snakemake)
# What value to use on match in sample-list of the results
# F/P for Fail/Pass - U/K for Update/Kept

column2: an X for a sample means it has been dropped at the given stage - no more data will be shown for later columns. Use upper case X for initial drop
column3: all other columns will get lower case x

column1: # What value to use on no-match in sample-list of the results
